name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Pie
author: Anna
summary: Graham Cracker Crust with a creamy peanut butter layer, a chocolate pudding layer, and a whipped topping layer. Very good but also very rich!
ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
directions: In a medium, microwave-safe bowl, combine butter and peanut butter
Heat in the microwave until soft; mix well
Gradually stir in confectioners' sugar until the mixture resembles a soft dough
In a small bowl, mix the milk with the instant pudding
Pour over the peanut butter mixture in each crust
Top pies with whipped topping when ready to serve
